mutants.code:
def reverse_arr(input_arr):
    left = 1
    right = len(input_arr) - 1
    while left < right:
        (input_arr[left], input_arr[right]) = (input_arr[right], input_arr[left])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return input_arr

def reverse_arr(input_arr):
    left = -1
    right = len(input_arr) - 1
    while left < right:
        (input_arr[left], input_arr[right]) = (input_arr[right], input_arr[left])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return input_arr
